title: Harley-Davidson, Triumph in first gear of challenge to Royal Enfield's India reign
description: The duo surprised the industry this month by unveiling their cheapest models globally in the largest motorbike market by sales, where their expensive imports have long struggled for market share. This time, they are making the bikes in India with domestic partners to bring prices below Rs 2,33,000.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
